text: The Portugal national futsal team represents Portugal in international futsal completions. They have qualified for the FIFA Futsal World Cup since 2000. They are one of the four countries along with Brazil, Argentina and Spain to win the tournament. ==Competitive record== A gold background colour indicates that Portugal won the tournament, a silver background colour indicates they were runner-up, a bronze background colour indicates a third place in the tournament, and a blue background indicates a fourth-place finish.
